text: contributors maintainers project, pledge respect people contribute reporting issues, posting feature requests, updating documentation, submitting pull requests patches, activities. committed making participation project harassment-free experience everyone, regardless level experience, gender, gender identity expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion, choice text editor. Examples unacceptable behavior participants include use sexual language imagery, derogatory comments personal attacks, trolling, public private harassment, insults, unprofessional conduct. what: 法律提案（the Records of the Bills）為例
title: 以「法律提案」為例
text: 讀取 legisTaiwan 與 stringr 套件 用get_bills()抓取周春米在「民國106年1月20」至「民111年3月10日」所提之法案。 抓取莊瑞雄在「民國106年1月20」至「民111年3月10日」所提之法案。 看看「民國106年1月20日」與「民國107年3月10日」之間，有提到「原住民」的法案

id: 以get_legislators-抓取歷屆委員資料為例
what: 以get_legislators() 抓取「歷屆委員資料」為例
title: 以「歷屆委員資料」為例
text: 使用tidyverse協助做資料整理，計算「性別」之個數。 計算「黨籍」之個數 製作直方圖  製作圓餅圖  查看不同性別於不同政黨中之比例
code: library(legisTaiwan) #> ## legisTaiwan                                            ### #> ## An R package connecting to the Taiwan Legislative API. ### library(tidyverse) #> ── Attaching core tidyverse packages ────────────────── tidyverse 2.0.0 ── #> ✔ dplyr     1.1.0     ✔ readr     2.1.4 #> ✔ forcats   1.0.0     ✔ stringr   1.5.0 #> ✔ ggplot2   3.4.1     ✔ tibble    3.2.1 #> ✔ lubridate 1.9.2     ✔ tidyr     1.3.0 #> ✔ purrr     1.0.1 #> ── Conflicts ──────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── #> ✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() #> ✖ dplyr::lag()    masks stats::lag() #> ℹ Use the conflicted package (<http://conflicted.r-lib.org/>) to force all conflicts to become errors info <- get_legislators(verbose = FALSE) #>  term is not defined... #>  You are now requesting full data from the API. Please make sure your connectivity is stable until its completion. legislators <- info$data legislators %>%    count(sex)  #> # A tibble: 2 × 2 #>   sex       n #>   <chr> <int> #> 1 女      370 #> 2 男     1163 legislators %>%    count(party)  #> # A tibble: 12 × 2 #>    party            n #>    <chr>        <int> #>  1 中國國民黨     696 #>  2 台灣團結聯盟    26 #>  3 台灣基進         1 #>  4 台灣民眾黨       7 #>  5 建國黨           3 #>  6 新黨            33 #>  7 時代力量         7 #>  8 民主進步黨     592 #>  9 民國黨           1 #> 10 無黨團結聯盟    23 #> 11 無黨籍          49 #> 12 親民黨          95 library(ggplot2) party <- legislators %>%    count(party)  ggplot(data = legislators, aes(x = party)) +   geom_bar() +   theme(text = element_text(family = "Heiti TC Light")) party_1 <- table(legislators$party) party.freq <- data.frame(party_1) names(party.freq)[1] <- "party"  ggplot(data = party.freq, aes(x = "", y = Freq, fill = party)) +   geom_bar(stat = "identity", width = 1) +   coord_polar(theta = "y", start = 0) +   theme_void()+   theme(text = element_text(family = "Heiti TC Light")) ggplot(data = legislators, aes(x = party, fill = sex)) +   geom_bar(position = "stack") +   # theme(text = element_text(family = "Heiti TC Light")) +   coord_flip()

title: 以「立委質詢」為例
text: 找出立委在第八屆會期質詢當中，包含「中國」字眼之質詢。
code: library(legisTaiwan) #> ## legisTaiwan                                            ### #> ## An R package connecting to the Taiwan Legislative API. ### library(stringr) question_from_10 <- get_parlquestions(term = 10) #>  Retrieved URL:  #>  https://data.ly.gov.tw/odw/ID6Action.action?term=10&sessionPeriod=&sessionTimes=&item=&fileType=json  #>  Retrieved Term:  10  #>  Retrieved Num:  1552 Q10_data <- question_from_10$data df <- Q10_data[str_detect(Q10_data[["item"]], "中國", negate = FALSE), ] print(df) #> # A tibble: 49 × 5 #>    term  sessionPeriod sessionTimes item                        selectTerm #>    <chr> <chr>         <chr>        <chr>                       <chr>      #>  1 10    01            01           三、本院許委員淑華，鑑於新… all        #>  2 10    01            01           八、本院許委員淑華，鑑於新… all        #>  3 10    01            01           十二、本院許委員淑華，鑑於… all        #>  4 10    01            01           四十四、本院林委員德福，有… all        #>  5 10    01            04           四十二、本院許委員淑華，鑑… all        #>  6 10    01            04           四十九、本院許委員淑華，鑑… all        #>  7 10    01            05           六、本院許委員淑華，鑑於美… all        #>  8 10    01            05           十七、本院邱委員志偉，鑑於… all        #>  9 10    01            05           三十五、本院許委員淑華，鑑… all        #> 10 10    01            05           四十、本院許委員淑華，鑑於… all        #> # ℹ 39 more rows

title: User Manual
text: get_parlquestions(): parliamentary questions asked legislators 提供議事日程本院委員之質詢事項資訊 (自第8 __10__屆) get_meetings(): spoken meeting records 委員發言 get_caucus_meetings(): meeting records cross-caucus session 提供公報之黨團協商資訊 (自第8屆) get_executive_response(): questions answered executives提供公報質詢事項行政院答復資訊 (自第8屆) get_public_debates()+: public debates 提供公報之國是論壇資訊，並包含書面意見自 (自第8屆) get_speech_video(): full video information meetings committees 提供立法院院會及委員會之委員發言片段相關影片資訊 (自第9屆)

title: User Manual
text: get_committee_record(): records reviewed items committees 提供委員會會議審查之議案項目 (自第8屆) get_bills(): records bills 法律提案 (能取得最早日不詳，待檢查) get_bills_2(): records legislators government bill proposals 提供委員及政府之議案提案資訊 (自第8屆) passed_legislation(): legislation information passed third reading 提供公報院會紀錄之三讀通過議案資訊 (自第8屆第1會期起) coming soon

title: User Manual
text: get_variable_info(): API’s endpoint user manuals 使用說明文件 review_session_info(): session period year formatted Minguo (ROC) calendar 屆期年對照表 get_legislators(): legislator demographics 提供委員基本資料  + Check Required: user manual seems inconsistent actual data. Please check discussion 參數設定後與資料取得不一致，待確認。

title: Quick Start
text: legisTaiwan R package accessing Taiwan Legislative Yuan API. goal legisTaiwan make quickly instantly download Taiwan’s legislative data, digitized textual video records research project analyze public policies. initial development part David Yen-Chieh Liao’ Dissertation project Electoral Reform, Distributive Politics, Parties Taiwanese Congress supported 2021 Taiwanese Overseas Pioneers Grant (TOP GRANT), National Science Technology Council (NSTC) Taiwan. package , therefore, great benefit researchers, students, policy analysts interested Taiwan legislative politics (Taiwan politics general) fewer financial resources. addition, annotation digitized text labelled records video contents may interest researchers students want build algorithm computational research social science make Taiwan’s democracy transparent accountable.
code: install.packages("remotes") remotes::install_github("davidycliao/legisTaiwan", force = TRUE) library(legisTaiwan) #> ## legisTaiwan                                            ### #> ## An R package connecting to the Taiwan Legislative API. ###

title: Accessing Real-time and Archives of Taiwan Legislative Data in R
text: legisTaiwan requires stable internet connectivity data retrieval function API. functions can directly used retrieve long period data extremely bandwidth-intensive, given download sizes data stores. downloading extended period data, suggest using get_variable_info() double-check current size files API manual write loop appropriate handlers recording progress file input make sure requested data complete.

text: Records Bills 法律提案

title: The Records of the Bills 法律提案 — get_bills
code: get_bills(start_date = NULL, end_date = NULL, proposer = NULL, verbose = TRUE)

title: The Records of the Bills 法律提案 — get_bills
text: start_date numeric Must formatted Minguo (Taiwan) calendar, e.g. 1090101. end_date numeric Must formatted Minguo (Taiwan) calendar, e.g. 1090102. proposer default value NULL, means bill proposed legislators included starting date ending date. verbose logical, indicates whether get_bills print detailed output retrieving data. default value TRUE.

title: The Records of the Bills 法律提案 — get_bills
text: list, contains: title meeting records cross-caucus session query_time query time retrieved_number number observation meeting_unit meeting unit start_date_ad start date  POSIXct end_date_ad end date POSIXct start_date start date ROC Taiwan calendar url retrieved json url variable_names variables tibble dataframe manual_info official manual, https://www.ly.gov.tw/Pages/List.aspx?nodeid=153; use legisTaiwan::get_variable_info("get_bills") data tibble dataframe, whose variables include: sessionPeriod 會期 sessionTimes 會次 meetingTimes 提案日期 billName 提案名稱 billProposer 主提案人 billCosignatory 連署提案 billStatus 議案狀態 date_ad 西元年

title: The Records of the Bills 法律提案 — get_bills
text: get_bills produces list, contains query_time, retrieved_number, meeting_unit, start_date_ad, end_date_ad, start_date, end_date, url, variable_names, manual_info data.

title: The Records of the Bills 法律提案 — get_bills
